I want to write the following XPath query:

// @has task_lists/index.html '//li/input[@type="checkbox"]/following-sibling::text()' 'a'

Unfortunately, this isn't supported by the built-in XPath engine in python: https://stackoverflow.com/a/41409525/7669110. How feasible is it to switch to lxml? I don't know what the policy is for python dependencies.
